original_title: Janashakthi wins ‘Domestic Life Insurer of the Year’ and ‘Digital Insurance Initiative of the Year’
original_body_lines: Janashakthi Life, a pioneering life insurance provider in Sri Lanka, has once again demonstrated its industry excellence by securing two prestigious accolades at the highly acclaimed Insurance Asia Awards. The event, which brings together Asia’s foremost insurance companies, celebrates their exceptional initiatives, innovative products, and ground-breaking solutions.

Standing out, Janashakthi Life emerged as the proud recipient of two coveted titles: “Domestic Life Insurer of the Year – Sri Lanka” and “Digital Insurance Initiative of the Year – Sri Lanka.” These accolades reflect the company’s unwavering commitment to pioneering insurance solutions, even amid challenging macro-economic conditions, resulting in a strong financial performance.

Notably, this is the second consecutive year that Janashakthi Life has been honoured as the “Domestic Life Insurer of the Year” at the Insurance Asia Awards, a testament to the company’s steadfast dedication to delivering exceptional insurance services in Sri Lanka. The recognition further solidifies Janashakthi Life’s position as a leading player, and as an ‘Award Winning, Market Challenger’ in the country’s life insurance sector.

Commenting on the achievements, Ravi Liyanage, Director and Chief Executive Officer of Janashakthi Life, expressed, “We are thrilled to receive these prestigious awards from Insurance Asia Awards for the second year in a row. They not only recognize our resilience and unwavering dedication to our customers but also highlight our commitment to leveraging digital innovation to enhance the insurance experience. These wins validate our strategic focus on delivering excellence in the Sri Lankan insurance landscape.”

Janashakthi Life’s commitment to innovation and customer-centric solutions has been a driving force behind its success. By expanding its digital footprint, the company has introduced ground-breaking digital platforms and tools that simplify insurance processes and enhance accessibility for its customers.

As the insurance landscape continues to evolve, Janashakthi Life remains committed to pushing boundaries and surpassing customer expectations. The company’s dual wins at the Insurance Asia Awards 2023 demonstrate its dedication to driving positive change within the industry and ensuring customer satisfaction.
‘Gift of life from the Brandix Group, Sri Lanka’s largest corporate donor of blood’
